title: The Wildest Place
description: Sala thought early retirement meant her bondmates, animal companions she is linked to, were safe. Then someone from her past tracked her to her beachfront property to exact their revenge on those closest to her. Sala must reconnect with her old partner, Derulo, to determine who the culprit is and who might be next on the hitlist. She battles her fractured psyche and the fear of losing the only person she has left, to bring those responsible to justice.
author: Kyla Phillips
